attributes.action: North Korean Human Rights and UK Governments Stance on North Korea.
attributes.additional_details:
I would like a statement from the UK government on the current escalation on North Korean threats and their stance on the situation.
Also I would like a statement and the UK government to recognize the lack of human rights in North Korea when it comes to labor camps that innocent people are sent to and never leave.
I understand the current situation with North Korea is fragile to say the least, but political pressure must be applied to stop these labor camps and the civilian brutality.
This breaks almost every article of the UN's Universal Declaration of Human Rights, and must be addressed.
